title: Ping 200-500 all game
body:
I load into the game fine but right when people start leaving the fountain my ping goes up to 200-500 and only goes down to the 60's every 10 mins. 

It'll only sit at 60 for a little under a min (if I'm lucky) then it'll keep doing the same thing

replies.body: Nevermind, I was using files from 3 years ago I just uploaded

When trying to submit the Network logs it tells me that they're not netlogs, I tried moving them to my desktop and selecting them from there and just manually going to the file neither would allow me to submit the logs

This issue sounds like a degrading connection to the game server, and suffering from something like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of your specific issue.  It should also yield some troubleshoot steps as well in response to the issues found.  Let me know your results!
